title: Owner signs up and authenticates Snapshot

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Paid Ad Click-to-Order Attribution (Google/Meta IDs). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
